definition: tree/wood/coffin/wooden/simple/numb/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]

sentences.english: A good shingle roof is a most durable type of roof.
sentences.chinese: 用優質木瓦蓋的屋頂是一種經久耐用的屋頂。

sentences.english: The shingles used to mount the mirror were blown off roofs in storms.
sentences.chinese: 安裝鏡頭的框框是從颶風從房項吹出的木瓦。

sentences.english: The small annex has a slanted roof covered with wooden shingles that extend all the way to the ground.
sentences.chinese: 小型附屬建築物傾斜的木瓦屋頂一路延伸到地面。

sentences.english: The outside façade and the roof have been finished with local silver fir shingles.
sentences.chinese: 外立面和屋頂用當地銀杉所做成的木瓦覆蓋完成。

sentences.english: Instead of stone, the extensions are entirely covered of white cedar shingles.
sentences.chinese: 摒棄了傳統的石料，擴建全部運用了白色木瓦。

sentences.english: When laying the roof,make sure that the shingles lap over each other.
sentences.chinese: 鋪屋頂時，一定要讓木瓦重疊排放。

definition: a building/the frame of a building/roof beam/truss
